author: emmanuel fernandez
comment: This app is helpful due to hard of hearing it made an an audiobook that sounded muffled into a more listenable audiobook wish this had the ability to reckon hearing loss programming it would be a lot helpful and more accurately enhance otherwise it's a solid app all around

author: Matt Binning
comment: Within a few minutes of downloading, I bought the app. The difference it's made in the sound of my wireless earbuds is incredible, I'll update my review if the battery drain is bad which is what I'm expecting. Edit; the volume amplifier stops working everytime the next song plays which is quite annoying, only fix I've found is to adjust one of the knobs to reactivate it Edit 2; experimental fix solves this but with a 1 second delay before the volume amplifier kicks in

author: Brian Ellair
comment: Great equalizer but at the start of every song there is a blast of music at maximum volume for about half a second. This has made the app unusable.

author: JATHIN Y
comment: I bought this app and it doesn't recognise any artist in my google play music. All the songs on my device are bought

author: HeartBreak One
comment: Did not expect it to work as well as it did, five stars.

author: Alok Dubey
comment: Best equalizer ever I used.Thank you guys.

author: Thiên Bảo Nguyễn Mai
comment: Ehh... Is it even working? Cause i don't hear any bass been boosted, or any surround boost at all.

author: Dean Clark
comment: Again with the adds and paywalls.  Give us a full add free trial to see whether we like it or not.  How can we have faith in a product you clearly don't.
Wonderful app one off the best 😎💖

author: Eddie Coleman Jr
comment: need some better instructions.

author: Mikie Jenkins
comment: Well worth it. I love it

author: Mike Walters
comment: Wouldn't work with beats
Professional headphone tuning, so good.

author: mojhib comics
comment: Nonsense money greedy

author: Karen Najar
comment: Interesting equalizer

author: noemi acevedo
comment: Love this app

author: Mayank S
comment: JBL T450. Great app dude. Amazing. Maza aa gaya kasam se.
Some help

reply.author: ManyThingsDev
reply.content: Hello, if you need help in using the app, please send us an email. Thanks!

author: Gautam Rajan
comment: Truly an amazing app. The most accurate EQ on the market. Worked for me, when the other ones didn't. Also it has extra features like burn in that I wasn't expecting so that was a nice surprise.  EDIT: On Pixel 2 Android 8.1: This app seriously drains battery. To the point where I have to stop using it. Really sad since it's the best EQ app I've used. This app drains up to 6%/hr, sometimes more.

author: Donna Howard
comment: I wasn't able to understand what the instructions were telling me to do. My music sounded horrible with this app applied. I would set controls to what sounded good to me but the next screen took the sound way down...sounded cheap like with no base at all.

author: Faye Dunlap
comment: Only works about 20% of the time for me. It usually craps out after two songs.I have to completely restart my music and this app if I need to pause a song to get it to play anything when I go to un-pause. When it does work I like that I can adjust the levels myself but it also gives a guide line if I need to just do a standard adjustment

author: David Osah
comment: Look man, this used to be BY FAR the best EQ app on the Play Store. The settings still sound fine, but whenever I use it, it turns the Google Play Music app into a laggy, buggy mess. Other EQ apps don't do this at all. This is especially disappointing since I paid for the pro version. Please fix this, I really love this app. I'm on the LG G4

reply.author: ManyThingsDev
reply.content: We will look forward to this issue. Thanks

author: John M. Gerard
comment: Updated 2-16-2018 One bug tweak - the one off button. Says on and flashes off just for a second then the button still says on. To tell at a glance if the app is working and in the on or off state it would be nice to have the button change from on to off.so I know if the EQ is in the on state or off state. This little change would help me a lot.and as I state below R/L balance control.but this app works great. This is one of the best EQ apps I have found so far. Like most EQ app this app does cut the audio gain a little. You can compensate by using the audio gain control. The one thing missing is left right balance control.  Most other EQ apps either did not seem to do anything or would crash.

author: Chris O
comment: Best alternative to Viper4Android if your not rooted! Great app although it does sometimes randomly try to turn itself off but the sound it gives is very clear and there are plenty of settings to adjust exactly how you like.. 4 stars 👍

author: T3hHappyEmo
comment: Despite being the first result for "sound balance", there is no such feature (left right)

reply.author: ManyThingsDev
reply.content:
Hello T3hHappyEmo,
unluckily Android doesn't let system wide Left Right channel balance. You have to refer to your music player or your device settings. You may find some more infos in Headphones Equalizer FAQs.

author: Tony Langley
comment: This app is all it's cracked up to be. I recommend it for anyone. Quality sound quality control. Thumbs up

author: tandlaguilera420
comment: I love this app so much I paid for the full version! It sounds awesome and works well with my Google Pixel buds.

author: Sami Hutia
comment: แอปมีการปรับปรุงแก้ไขทำให้ตอนนี้ชอบมากเลย

author: Michael Solorzano
comment: Works for LG G6 and Duracell headphones. Happy.

author: Melissa Clayton
comment: I know .This is one very cool music app .✌thanx rite on .now I'm drawing and ROCKIN'💋
Gave my ear buds the sound I was looking for!

author: Heather Greene
comment: Finally  I  found an app that actually works! Thanks a bunch 😉😀😎🎼🕪🎧🎛

author: Ryan Bremler
comment: Works great with pa Dora and the auto genre equalizer thing works fantastically

author: Garrett Solombrino
comment: I was trying to balance the L/R headphones but this app does not do this

reply.author: ManyThingsDev
reply.content: Hello Garrett, system wide channel balance is not possible via app in Android. Your device may however have this feature in the accessibility settings. You can find more informations in the app FAQs. Thanks

author: Zezen Zaenal Mutaqin
comment: This is the app that I looking for. Focus on headphone! The sound is truly boosted!

author: Back 4 More
comment: Amazing difference after adding this app. I can totally shape the music to my preference. Thanks ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐👍😎

author: Mithil Morajkar
comment: Superb app Controls all the bluetooth headphones for bass and treble Best result

author: KHAIRUL ANWAR
comment: Nice n'clear sounds 4 me too listenit's..,good jobs guy's..,👍up..;😴

author: Faiz Jabbarullah
comment: Significantly better sound quality through my cheap apple earphones

author: Jerry Kitchen
comment: Excellent on my lg x charge. Clear sound and extra bass.
